<table cellpadding="5" cellspacing="0" width="100%"><tbody><tr valign="top"><td>
<p style="margin: 0px 17px 0px 0px;">2 Decks.  Medium (50%).  Skill/Luck Balanced.</p>

<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Object</span></p>
<p>To move all the cards to the <a class="popuplink">foundations</a>.</p>

<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Layout</span></p>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td>8 <a class="popuplink">foundation</a> piles (left and right) - on left piles build <a class="popuplink">up in suit</a> from Ace to King, on right piles build <a class="popuplink">down in suit</a> from King to Ace.</td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td>12 <a class="popuplink">tableau</a> piles (around the edge, between the Aces and Kings) - No building.  Top card is available for play on the <a class="popuplink">foundations</a>   Spaces are filled automatically.  The 4 cards each on the left and right sides are called the wall, the two cards in the top middle and bottom middle are called the gate. Spaces in the wall are filled automatically from the <a class="popuplink">waste</a> (or the <a class="popuplink">stock</a> if the <a class="popuplink">waste</a> is empty), spaces in the gate are filled automatically from the <a class="popuplink">reserve</a>.  At the start of the game 1 card is dealt to each pile. </td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td><a class="popuplink">stock</a> (middle, face down on left) - move 1 card to <a class="popuplink">waste</a> by clicking.  Two <a class="popuplink">redeals</a>.</td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td><a class="popuplink">waste</a> (beside <a class="popuplink">stock</a>) - top card available for play on the <a class="popuplink">foundations</a>.</td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td><a class="popuplink">reserve</a> (middle) - top card fills spaces in the gate piles of the <a class="popuplink">tableau</a> or play to the <a class="popuplink">foundations</a>. The cards cannot otherwise be moved.  At the start of the game 21 cards are dealt to this pile.</td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Options</span></p>
<p><span class="f_Format3"><a>AutoPlay</a></span></p>

</td></tr></tbody></table>

<table cellpadding="5" cellspacing="0" width="100%"><tbody><tr valign="top"><td>
<p style="margin: 0px 17px 0px 0px;">1 Deck.  Hard (20%).  Mostly Skill.</p>

<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Object</span></p>
<p>To move all the cards to the <a class="popuplink">foundations</a>.</p>

<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Layout</span></p>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td>4 <a class="popuplink">foundation</a> piles (middle) - build <a class="popuplink">up in suit</a> from Ace to King.  At the start of the game two Aces are dealt to the first 2 piles.</td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td>10 <a class="popuplink">tableau</a> piles (left and right of <a class="popuplink">foundations</a>) - build <a class="popuplink">up or down by suit</a>.  Only the top card of each pile is available for play, except that once per game a draw (or merci) is available.  Right-clicking on any buried card will move that card to the top of its pile.  This can only be done once in each game.  Spaces may be filled by any available card.  At the start of the game 5 cards are dealt to each pile.</td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Options</span></p>
<p><span class="f_Format3"><a>AutoPlay</a></span></p>

<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">History</span></p>
<p>Fortress of Mercy is a variation of <a href="fortress.htm">Fortress</a>.</p>

<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Similar Games</span></p>
<p><a href="fortress.htm">Fortress</a></p>

<table cellpadding="5" cellspacing="0" width="100%"><tbody><tr valign="top"><td>
<p style="margin: 0px 17px 0px 0px;">1 Deck.  Very Easy (100%).  All Luck.</p>

<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Object</span></p>
<p>To move all the cards to the <a class="popuplink">foundations</a>.</p>

<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Layout</span></p>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td>4 <a class="popuplink">foundation</a> piles (across top) - build <a class="popuplink">up in suit</a> from Ace to King.  At the start of the game the Aces are dealt here.</td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td>12 <a class="popuplink">tableau</a> piles (in box) - build <a class="popuplink">down in suit</a>.  The top card of each pile is available for play.  Only one card at a time may be moved.  Spaces are filled from the <a class="popuplink">waste</a> or <a class="popuplink">stock</a> automatically.  At the start of the game 1 card is dealt face up to each pile.</td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td><a class="popuplink">stock</a> (left, face down) - deal 1 card at a time to the <a class="popuplink">waste</a> by clicking.  No <a class="popuplink">redeals</a>.</td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td><a class="popuplink">waste</a> (below <a class="popuplink">stock</a>) - top card is available for play on the <a class="popuplink">foundations</a> or <a class="popuplink">tableau</a>.</td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Options</span></p>
<p><span class="f_Format3"><a>AutoPlay</a></span></p>

<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">History</span></p>
<p>Fortune's Favor is a simple game related to <a href="busy_aces.htm">Busy Aces</a>, except it uses only 1 deck. This game is easy to win.</p>

</td></tr></tbody></table>

<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Object</span></p>
<p>To move all the cards to the <a class="popuplink">foundations</a>.</p>

<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Layout</span></p>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td>8 <a class="popuplink">foundation</a> piles (top) - build <a class="popuplink">up in suit</a> from Ace to King.</td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td>8 <a class="popuplink">tableau</a> piles (below <a class="popuplink">foundations</a>) - build <a class="popuplink">down in suit</a>.  Only one card at a time may be moved.  Spaces may be filled with any card.  At the start of the game 5 cards are dealt to each of the 8 piles.</td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td><a class="popuplink">stock</a> (bottom left, face down) - turn over cards 1 at a time to the <a class="popuplink">waste</a> by clicking.  One <a class="popuplink">redeal</a>.</td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td><a class="popuplink">waste</a> (next to <a class="popuplink">stock</a>) - top card is available for play on the <a class="popuplink">foundations</a> or <a class="popuplink">tableau</a>.</td></tr></tbody></table></div>

<p style="margin: 0px 17px 0px 0px;">2 Decks.  Medium (40%).  Mostly Skill.</p>

<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Object</span></p>
<p>To move all the cards to the <a class="popuplink">foundations</a>.</p>

<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Layout</span></p>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td>8 <a class="popuplink">foundation</a> piles (across top) - build <a class="popuplink">up in suit</a> from Ace to King.</td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td>10 <a class="popuplink">tableau</a> piles (below <a class="popuplink">foundations</a>) - build <a class="popuplink">down in suit</a>.  Move groups of cards only if they are in sequence <a class="popuplink">down in suit</a>. Spaces may be filled by any card.  At the start of the game 4 cards are dealt to each pile.</td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td><a class="popuplink">stock</a> (bottom left, face down) - turn over 1 card at a time to the <a class="popuplink">waste</a> by clicking.  No <a class="popuplink">redeals</a>.</td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td><a class="popuplink">waste</a> (next to <a class="popuplink">stock</a>) - top card is available for play on the <a class="popuplink">foundations</a> or <a class="popuplink">tableau</a>.  All cards in the waste are visible.</td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Options</span></p>
<p><span class="f_Format3"><a>AutoPlay</a></span></p>

<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Tips</span></p>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td>Try to get a space in the tableau as quickly as possible. </td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">History</span></p>
<p>Forty Bandits is a variation of <a href="forty_thieves.htm">Forty Thieves</a> where groups of cards in sequence may be moved, making it a slightly easier game. </p>

<table cellpadding="5" cellspacing="0" width="100%"><tbody><tr valign="top"><td>
<p style="margin: 0px 17px 0px 0px;">2 Decks.  Hard (2%).  Mostly Skill.</p>

<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Object</span></p>
<p>To move all the cards to the <a class="popuplink">foundations</a>.</p>

<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Layout</span></p>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td>8 <a class="popuplink">foundation</a> piles (across top) - build left 4 piles <a class="popuplink">up in suit</a> from Ace to King,  drop 13 card sequences of same suit cards from the <a class="popuplink">tableau</a> on the right 4 piles.</td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td>10 <a class="popuplink">tableau</a> piles (below <a class="popuplink">foundations</a>) - build <a class="popuplink">down in suit</a>.  Groups of cards in sequence <a class="popuplink">down in suit</a> may be moved as a unit. S<span class="f_Format3">paces are filled by a</span>ny card or legal group of cards.  At the start of the game 4 cards are dealt face up to each pile.</td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td><a class="popuplink">stock</a> (top left, face down) - deal 1 card to the <a class="popuplink">waste</a> pile by clicking.  No <a class="popuplink">redeals</a>.</td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td><a class="popuplink">waste</a> (right of <a class="popuplink">stock</a>) - top card is available for play on the <a class="popuplink">foundations</a> or <a class="popuplink">tableau</a>.</td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Options</span></p>
<p><span class="f_Format3"><a>AutoPlay</a></span></p>

<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Notes</span></p>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 17px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td>The first 4 <a class="popuplink">foundations</a> are built <a class="popuplink">up in suit</a> from Ace to King (using any suits for the 4 piles).   The last 4 <a class="popuplink">foundations</a> are built in the <a class="popuplink">tableau</a>.  Build 4 13-card sequences of same suit, from King down to Ace.  To move these cards to the <a class="popuplink">foundations</a>, pick up the entire 13-card sequence and drop it on the desired <a class="popuplink">foundation</a> pile.   Single cards are not allowed in these <a class="popuplink">foundation</a> piles.</td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">History</span></p>
<p>Forty Devils was invented by <a href="thomas_warfield.htm">Thomas Warfield</a>. </p>

<p style="margin: 0px 17px 0px 0px;">1 Deck.  Hard (10%).  Skill.</p>

<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Object</span></p>
<p>To move all the cards to the <a class="popuplink">foundations</a>.</p>

<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Layout</span></p>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td>4 <a class="popuplink">foundation</a> piles (top right) - build <a class="popuplink">up in suit</a> from Ace to King.</td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td>4 <a class="popuplink">cells</a> (top left) - storage locations for cards.  Only 1 card allowed in each <a class="popuplink">cell</a>.  At the start of the game one card is dealt to each <a class="popuplink">cell</a>.</td></tr></tbody></table></div><p style="margin: 0px 17px 0px 0px;"><span style="color: #000000;"> </span></p>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 17px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td>6 <a class="popuplink">tableau</a> piles (below <a class="popuplink">foundations</a> and <a class="popuplink">cells</a>) - build <a class="popuplink">down by any suit but the same</a>.  Move groups of cards if they are in sequence <a class="popuplink">down by any suit but the same</a> and <span class="f_Format3">if there are enough free <a class="popuplink">cells</a> that the cards could be moved individually.</span>  Spaces can be filled by any card or legal group of cards.  At the start of the game 8 cards are dealt face up to each pile.</td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Options</span></p>
<p><span class="f_Format3"><a>AutoPlay</a></span></p>

<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Notes</span></p>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td><span class="f_Format3">Groups of cards in the <a class="popuplink">tableau</a> can only be moved as a group if there are a sufficient number of empty <a class="popuplink">cells</a> available to store the cards individually.  The ability to move cards as a group is only a shortcut to moving the group one card at a time.</span></td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Tips</span></p>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td><span class="f_Format3">Try to keep as many <a class="popuplink">cells</a> empty as possible.</span></td></tr></tbody></table></div>

<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td>8 <a class="popuplink">foundation</a> piles (across top) - build <a class="popuplink">up in suit</a> from Ace to King.</td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td>10 <a class="popuplink">tableau</a> piles (below <a class="popuplink">foundations</a>) - build <a class="popuplink">down regardless of suit</a>.  Move groups of cards if they are in sequence <a class="popuplink">down in suit</a>.  Fill spaces with Kings or groups of cards headed by a King.  At the start of the game 4 cards are dealt to each pile.</td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td><a class="popuplink">stock</a> (top left, face down) - turn over 1 card at a time to the <a class="popuplink">waste</a> by clicking.  One <a class="popuplink">redeal</a>.</td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td><a class="popuplink">waste</a> (next to <a class="popuplink">stock</a>) - top card is available for play on the <a class="popuplink">foundations</a> or <a class="popuplink">tableau</a>. </td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Options</span></p>
<p><span class="f_Format3"><a>AutoPlay</a></span></p>


<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">History</span></p>
<p><span class="f_Format3">Forty Winks is <a href="rectangular.htm">Rectangular</a> with a redeal</span>. </p>

<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Similar Games</span></p>
<p><span class="f_Format3"><a href="rectangular.htm">Rectangular</a></span></p>
<p><a href="forty_thieves.htm">Forty Thieves</a></p>

</td></tr></tbody></table>

# Forty-Nine

<table cellpadding="5" cellspacing="0" width="100%">
<tbody><tr valign="middle">
<td>
<p class="p_Heading1"><span class="f_Heading1">Forty-Nine</span></p>
</td>
<td>
<span style="font-size: 9pt">
<a href="contents.htm">Top</a> 
<a href="forty_winks.htm">Previous</a> 
<a href="forwards.htm">Next</a>
</span>
</td>
</tr>
</tbody></table>
<table cellpadding="5" cellspacing="0" width="100%"><tbody><tr valign="top"><td>
<p style="margin: 0px 17px 0px 0px;">2 Decks.  Very Hard (&lt;1%).  Skill/Luck balanced.</p>

<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Object</span></p>
<p>To move all the cards to the <a class="popuplink">foundations</a>.</p>

<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Layout</span></p>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td>8 <a class="popuplink">foundation</a> piles (across top) - build <a class="popuplink">up in suit</a> from Ace to King.</td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td>7 <a class="popuplink">tableau</a> piles (below <a class="popuplink">foundations</a>) - build <a class="popuplink">down by alternate color</a>.  Only one card at a time may be moved, except when moving groups of cards <a class="popuplink">down by alternate color</a> into an empty space .  Spaces may be filled by any available card or group of cards.   At the start of the game 7 cards are dealt face up to each pile.</td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td><a class="popuplink">stock</a> (face down) - turn over cards one at a time to the <a class="popuplink">waste</a> by clicking.  No <a class="popuplink">redeals</a>.</td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td><a class="popuplink">waste</a> (below <a class="popuplink">stock</a>) - Top card always available for play on the <a class="popuplink">foundations</a> or <a class="popuplink">tableau</a>.</td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Options</span></p>
<p><span class="f_Format3"><a>AutoPlay</a></span></p>

<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">History</span></p>
<p>Forty-Nine is a variation of <a href="interchange.htm">Interchange</a>.</p>

<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Similar Games</span></p>

<p><a href="unlimited.htm">Unlimited</a></p>

<p><a href="crossroads.htm">Crossroads</a></p>


</td></tr></tbody></table>

# Forwards

<table cellpadding="5" cellspacing="0" width="100%">
<tbody><tr valign="middle">
<td>
<p class="p_Heading1"><span class="f_Heading1">Forwards</span></p>
</td>
<td>
<span style="font-size: 9pt">
<a href="contents.htm">Top</a> 
<a href="forty_nine.htm">Previous</a> 
<a href="forwards_and_backwards.htm">Next</a>
</span>
</td>
</tr>
</tbody></table>
<table cellpadding="5" cellspacing="0" width="100%"><tbody><tr valign="top"><td>
<p style="margin: 0px 17px 0px 0px;">2 Decks.  Hard (1%).  Mostly Luck.</p>

<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Object</span></p>
<p>To move all the cards to the <a class="popuplink">tableau</a>.</p>

<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Layout</span></p>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td>28 <a class="popuplink">tableau</a> piles - pair the top card of the <a class="popuplink">stock</a> with the top card of a pile where the <a class="popuplink">ranks</a> add to 14. Valid pairs are A-K, 2-Q, 3-J, 4-10, 5-9, 6-8, 7-7.  Piles may contain more than 2 cards (for example, the pile may begin with an 8, a 6 can be played on it, then another 8, and so on).  Cards cannot be moved from one pile to another.  The game ends if the top card of the <a class="popuplink">stock</a> cannot be played to a pile.  The game is won if all the cards are placed on the <a class="popuplink">tableau</a> .</td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td><a class="popuplink">stock</a> (top left corner) - cards are built on the <a class="popuplink">tableau</a>.</td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Valid Discards</span></p>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td>Ace-King, 2-Queen, 3-Jack, 4-10, 5-9, 6-8, 7-7</td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">History</span></p>
<p>Forwards is a variation of <a href="forwards_and_backwards.htm">Forwards and Backwards</a> invented by <a href="thomas_warfield.htm">Thomas Warfield</a>.</p>

<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Similar Games</span></p>
<p><a href="forwards_and_backwards.htm">Forwards and Backwards</a></p>
</td></tr></tbody></table>

# Forwards and Backwards

<table cellpadding="5" cellspacing="0" width="100%">
<tbody><tr valign="middle">
<td>
<p class="p_Heading1"><span class="f_Heading1">Forwards and Backwards</span></p>
</td>
<td>
<span style="font-size: 9pt">
<a href="contents.htm">Top</a> 
<a href="forwards.htm">Previous</a> 
<a href="four_by_five.htm">Next</a>
</span>
</td>
</tr>
</tbody></table>
<table cellpadding="5" cellspacing="0" width="100%"><tbody><tr valign="top"><td>
<p style="margin: 0px 17px 0px 0px;">2 Decks.  Very Hard (&lt;1%).  Mostly Luck.</p>

<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Object</span></p>
<p>To discard all the cards.</p>

<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Layout</span></p>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td>20 <a class="popuplink">tableau</a> piles - in the first part of the game (the "Forwards" part), pair the top card of the <a class="popuplink">stock</a> with the top card of a pile where the <a class="popuplink">ranks</a>  add to 14. Valid pairs are A-K, 2-Q, 3-J, 4-10, 5-9, 6-8, 7-7.  Piles may contain more than 2 cards (for example, the pile may begin with an 8, a 6 can be played on it, then another 8, and so on).   Cards cannot be moved from one pile to another.  The game ends if the top card of the <a class="popuplink">stock</a> cannot be played to a pile.  If all the cards in the <a class="popuplink">stock</a><span class="f_Format3"> are played to the </span><a class="popuplink">tableau</a><span class="f_Format3">, then the second part of the game (the "Backwards" part) begins.  Pairs of cards whose </span><a class="popuplink">ranks</a> add to 14 are removed from the <a class="popuplink">tableau</a><span class="f_Format3"> (cards can be paired by dropping one card on the other, or moving the cards to the </span><a class="popuplink">reserve</a>).  The two cards of the pair can both come from the same pile.  The game is won if all the cards are discarded.</td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td><a class="popuplink">stock</a> (top left corner) - cards are built on the <a class="popuplink">tableau</a>.</td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td><a class="popuplink">waste</a> (far right)  - Where paired cards go out of play.</td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td><a class="popuplink">reserve</a><span class="f_Format3"> (lower left) - where pairs of cards can be formed.</span></td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Valid Discards</span></p>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td>Ace-King, 2-Queen, 3-Jack, 4-10, 5-9, 6-8, 7-7</td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Similar Games</span></p>
<p><a href="forwards.htm">Forwards</a></p>
</td></tr></tbody></table>

# Four by Five

<table cellpadding="5" cellspacing="0" width="100%">
<tbody><tr valign="middle">
<td>
<p class="p_Heading1"><span class="f_Heading1">Four by Five</span></p>
</td>
<td>
<span style="font-size: 9pt">
<a href="contents.htm">Top</a> 
<a href="forwards_and_backwards.htm">Previous</a> 
<a href="four_by_ten.htm">Next</a>
</span>
</td>
</tr>
</tbody></table>
<table cellpadding="5" cellspacing="0" width="100%"><tbody><tr valign="top"><td>
<p style="margin: 0px 17px 0px 0px;">1 Deck.  Hard (2%).  Mostly Luck.</p>

<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Object</span></p>
<p>To move all the cards to the <a class="popuplink">foundations</a>.</p>

<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Layout</span></p>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td>4 <a class="popuplink">foundation</a> piles (center) - build each <a class="popuplink">foundation</a> in suit, regardless of order.  On the top <a class="popuplink">foundation</a>, any card of the same suit as the first card dealt may be played.  On the lower <a class="popuplink">foundations</a>, start with a card of the same <a class="popuplink">rank</a> as the first card dealt, then play any card of that suit where a card of the same <a class="popuplink">rank</a> has already been played to the <a class="popuplink">foundation</a> immediately above.</td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td>4 <a class="popuplink">reserve</a> piles (left of <a class="popuplink">foundations</a>) - top card is available for play on the <a class="popuplink">foundations</a>.  At the start of the game 5 cards are dealt to each pile, the top card is face up.</td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td><a class="popuplink">stock</a> (face down, right) - Turn over cards 3 at a time to the <a class="popuplink">waste</a> pile.  Unlimited <a class="popuplink">redeals</a>.</td></tr></tbody></table></div><p style="text-indent: -24px; margin: 0px 17px 0px 36px;"><span style="color: #000000;"> </span></p>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 17px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td><a class="popuplink">waste</a> (below <a class="popuplink">stock</a>) - The top card of the <a class="popuplink">waste</a> pile is available for play on the <a class="popuplink">foundations</a>.</td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">History</span></p>
<p>Four by Five is a variation of <a href="osmosis.htm">Osmosis</a>.  Because there are more cards in the <a class="popuplink">reserves</a> and the <a class="popuplink">stock</a> is dealt 3 cards at a time instead of 1, it is a harder game.</p>

<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Similar Games</span></p>
<p><a href="osmosis.htm">Osmosis</a></p>
<p><a href="peek.htm">Peek</a></p>
<p><a href="bridesmaids.htm">Bridesmaids</a></p>

</td></tr></tbody></table>

# Four by Ten

<table cellpadding="5" cellspacing="0" width="100%">
<tbody><tr valign="middle">
<td>
<p class="p_Heading1"><span class="f_Heading1">Four by Ten</span></p>
</td>
<td>
<span style="font-size: 9pt">
<a href="contents.htm">Top</a> 
<a href="four_by_five.htm">Previous</a> 
<a href="four_colours.htm">Next</a>
</span>
</td>
</tr>
</tbody></table>
<table cellpadding="5" cellspacing="0" width="100%"><tbody><tr valign="top"><td>
<p style="margin: 0px 17px 0px 0px;">1 Deck.  Medium (50%).  Skill.</p>

<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Object</span></p>
<p>To move all the cards to the <a class="popuplink">foundations</a>.</p>

<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Layout</span></p>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td>4 <a class="popuplink">foundation</a> piles (right) - build <a class="popuplink">up in suit</a> from Ace to King.</td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td>10 <a class="popuplink">cells</a> (middle) - storage locations for cards.  Only 1 card allowed in each <a class="popuplink">cell</a>.</td></tr></tbody></table></div><p style="margin: 0px 17px 0px 0px;"><span style="color: #000000;"> </span></p>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 17px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td>4 <a class="popuplink">tableau</a> piles (left) - build <a class="popuplink">down by alternate color</a>.  Move groups of cards if they are in sequence <a class="popuplink">down by alternate color</a> and <span class="f_Format3">if there are enough free <a class="popuplink">cells</a> that the cards could be moved individually.</span>  Spaces can be filled by any card or legal group of cards .  At the start of the game 13 cards are dealt face up to each piles.</td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Options</span></p>
<p><span class="f_Format3"><a>AutoPlay</a></span></p>

<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Notes</span></p>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td><span class="f_Format3">Groups of cards in the <a class="popuplink">tableau</a> can only be moved as a group if there are a sufficient number of empty <a class="popuplink">cells</a> available to store the cards individually.  The ability to move cards as a group is only a shortcut to moving the group one card at a time.</span></td></tr></tbody></table></div><p><span class="f_Format3"> </span></p>

<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">History</span></p>
<p>F<span class="f_Format3">our by Ten is a variation of <a href="freecell.htm">FreeCell</a>.</span></p>

<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Similar Games</span></p>
<p><span class="f_Format3"><a href="freecell.htm">FreeCell</a></span></p>
<p><a href="ten_by_one.htm">Ten by One</a></p>
</td></tr></tbody></table>

# Four Colours

<table cellpadding="5" cellspacing="0" width="100%">
<tbody><tr valign="middle">
<td>
<p class="p_Heading1"><span class="f_Heading1">Four Colours</span></p>
</td>
<td>
<span style="font-size: 9pt">
<a href="contents.htm">Top</a> 
<a href="four_by_ten.htm">Previous</a> 
<a href="four_leaf_clovers.htm">Next</a>
</span>
</td>
</tr>
</tbody></table>
<table cellpadding="5" cellspacing="0" width="100%"><tbody><tr valign="top"><td>
<p style="margin: 0px 17px 0px 0px;">1 Deck. Medium (60%).  Mostly Skill.</p>

<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Object</span></p>
<p style="margin: 0px 17px 0px 0px;">To move all the cards to the <a class="popuplink">foundations</a>.</p>

<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Layout</span></p>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td>4 <a class="popuplink">foundation</a> piles (right) - build <a class="popuplink">up in suit</a> from Ace to King.</td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td>4 <a class="popuplink">cells</a> (top) - storage locations for cards.  Only 1 card allowed in each <a class="popuplink">cell</a>.  Only 1 card of each suit is allowed in the <a class="popuplink">cells</a>.  First <a class="popuplink">cell</a> holds a <span style="font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial';">♣</span>, 2nd a <span style="font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #ff0000;">♦</span>, 3rd a <span style="font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #ff0000;">♥</span>, 4th a <span style="font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial';">♠</span>.</td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td>7 <a class="popuplink">tableau</a> piles (below <a class="popuplink">cells</a>) - build <a class="popuplink">down by alternate color</a>.  Move groups of cards if they are in sequence <a class="popuplink">down by alternate color</a>.  Fill spaces with any card or legal group of cards.  At the start of the game 13 cards are dealt to each of the leftmost 4 piles (all cards of the same suit are dealt to the same pile).  The remaining 3 piles start the game empty.</td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Options</span></p>
<p><span class="f_Format3"><a>AutoPlay</a></span></p>

<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Notes</span></p>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td>Only one card is allowed at a time in a cell, and only one card of each suit is allowed in the cells.  Note that the cell that can only hold a <span style="font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial';">♣</span>  is directly above the pile that starts the game with the 13 <span style="font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial';">♣</span> 's.  This is true for all the suits.</td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">History</span></p>
<p>Four Colours is a <a href="freecell.htm">Freecell</a> type game of German origin.</p>

<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Similar Games</span></p>
<p><a href="freecell.htm">Freecell</a></p>
</td></tr></tbody></table>

<table cellpadding="5" cellspacing="0" width="100%"><tbody><tr valign="top"><td>
<p style="margin: 0px 17px 0px 0px;">1 Deck.  Medium (40%).  Mostly Skill.</p>

<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Object</span></p>
<p style="text-indent: -6px; margin: 0px 17px 0px 6px;">To move all the cards to the <a class="popuplink">foundation</a>.</p>

<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Layout</span></p>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td>1 <a class="popuplink">foundation</a> pile (right) - build <a class="popuplink">up regardless of suit</a> from Ace to King, <a class="popuplink">wrapping</a> from King to Ace until the pile contains all 52 cards.</td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td>13 <a class="popuplink">tableau</a> piles (left of <a class="popuplink">foundation</a>) - build <a class="popuplink">up or down regardless of suit</a>, <a class="popuplink">wrapping</a> from King to Ace or Ace to King if necessary.  Only one card at a time may be moved.  Spaces are not filled.  At the start of the game 4 cards each are dealt to each pile. </td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Options</span></p>
<p><span class="f_Format3"><a href="auto_play.htm">AutoPlay</a></span></p>

<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">History</span></p>
<p>Four Leaf Clovers has some similarities to <a href="black_hole.htm">Black Hole</a>. </p>

<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Similar Games</span></p>
<p><a href="black_hole.htm">Black Hole</a></p>
</td></tr></tbody></table>

<table cellpadding="5" cellspacing="0" width="100%"><tbody><tr valign="top"><td>
<p style="margin: 0px 17px 0px 1px;">1 Deck.  Medium (45%).  Mostly Luck.</p>

<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Object</span></p>
<p style="margin: 0px 17px 0px 0px;">To move all the cards to the <a class="popuplink">foundations</a>.</p>

<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Layout</span></p>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td>4 <a class="popuplink">foundation</a> piles (corners) - build <a class="popuplink">up in suit</a> from the <a class="popuplink">rank</a> of first card dealt to the first pile, <a class="popuplink">wrapping</a> from King to Ace as necessary, until each pile contains 13 cards.</td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td>5 <a class="popuplink">tableau</a> piles (forming cross) - build <a class="popuplink">down regardless of suit</a>, <a class="popuplink">wrapping</a> from Ace to King as necessary.  Spaces are filled by any card.  At the start of the game 1 card is dealt to each pile.</td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 17px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td><a class="popuplink">stock</a> (face down) - turn over 1 card at a time to the <a class="popuplink">waste</a> by clicking.  No <a class="popuplink">redeals</a>.</td></tr></tbody></table></div><p style="text-indent: -24px; margin: 0px 17px 0px 36px;"><span style="color: #000000;"> </span></p>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 17px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td><a class="popuplink">waste</a> (next to <a class="popuplink">stock</a>) - top card is available for play on the <a class="popuplink">foundations</a> or <a class="popuplink">tableau</a>.</td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Options</span></p>

</td></tr></tbody></table>

<p style="margin: 0px 17px 0px 0px;">1 Deck. Hard (30%).  Mostly Skill.</p>

<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Object</span></p>
<p style="margin: 0px 17px 0px 0px;">To move all the cards to the <a class="popuplink">waste</a> piles.</p>

<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Layout</span></p>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td>4 <a class="popuplink">tableau</a> piles (left) - Build <a class="popuplink">down by alternate color</a>. Groups of cards may be moved as a unit if they are in sequence <a class="popuplink">down by alternate color</a>.  At the start of the game each pile contains 13 cards face up.  Spaces can be filled by any card or group of cards.</td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td>6 <a class="popuplink">waste</a> piles (right) - build from the <a class="popuplink">tableau</a> <a class="popuplink">down by alternate color</a>.  Groups of cards may be moved as a unit if they are in sequence <a class="popuplink">down by alternate color</a>.</td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Options</span></p>
<p><span class="f_Format3"><a>AutoPlay</a></span></p>

# Four Winds

<table cellpadding="5" cellspacing="0" width="100%">
<tbody><tr valign="middle">
<td>
<p class="p_Heading1"><span class="f_Heading1">Four Winds</span></p>

<span style="font-size: 9pt">

<table cellpadding="5" cellspacing="0" width="100%"><tbody><tr valign="top"><td>
<p>1 Deck.  Easy (83%).  Skill/Luck balanced.</p>

<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Object</span></p>
<p>To move all the cards to the <a class="popuplink">foundations</a>.</p>

<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Layout</span></p>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td>4 <a class="popuplink">foundation</a> piles (on the 4 sides, the four "winds") - build <a class="popuplink">up in suit</a> from Ace to King.  At the start of the game the Aces are dealt here.</td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td>16 <a class="popuplink">tableau</a> piles (4 each adjacent to each <a class="popuplink">foundation</a>) - No building.  Top card is available for play on the <a class="popuplink">foundations</a>   Spaces are filled from the <a class="popuplink">waste</a> or another <a class="popuplink">tableau</a> pile.  Spaces may only be filled by a card of the same <a class="popuplink">suit</a> as the <a class="popuplink">suit</a> of the <a class="popuplink">foundation</a> pile adjacent to the space.  At the start of the game 1 card is dealt to each pile.</td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td><a class="popuplink">stock</a> (middle, face down on left) - move 1 card to <a class="popuplink">waste</a> by clicking.  1 <a class="popuplink">redeal</a>.</td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td><a class="popuplink">waste</a> (beside <a class="popuplink">stock</a>) - top card available for play on the <a class="popuplink">foundations</a> or spaces in the <a class="popuplink">tableau</a>.</td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Options</span></p>
<p><span class="f_Format3"><a>AutoPlay</a></span></p>

<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Similar Games</span></p>

</td></tr></tbody></table>

</span>
</td>

<table cellpadding="5" cellspacing="0" width="100%"><tbody><tr valign="top"><td>
<p>2 Decks.  Medium (45%).  Skill/Luck balanced.</p>

<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Object</span></p>
<p style="margin: 0px 17px 0px 0px;">To move all the cards to the <a class="popuplink">foundations</a>.</p>

<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Layout</span></p>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td>8 <a class="popuplink">foundation</a> piles (in box at right) - build <a class="popuplink">up in suit</a> from Fours to King, <a class="popuplink">wrapping</a> to Ace, Two, Three.  At the start of the game the Fours are dealt to each pile.</td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td>6 <a class="popuplink">tableau</a> piles (across top, left) - build <a class="popuplink">down regardless of suit</a>, <a class="popuplink">wrapping</a> from Ace to King as necessary.  Groups of cards may be moved if they are in a sequence <a class="popuplink">down in suit</a>, <a class="popuplink">wrapping</a> from Ace to King as necessary.  Spaces can be filled by any card or legal group of cards.  At the start of the game 1 card is dealt face up to each pile.</td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td><a class="popuplink">stock</a> (bottom, face down on left) - move 1 card to <a class="popuplink">waste</a> by clicking.  No <a class="popuplink">redeals</a>.</td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td><a class="popuplink">waste</a> (beside <a class="popuplink">stock</a>) - top card available for play on the <a class="popuplink">foundations</a> or <a class="popuplink">tableau</a>.</td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Options</span></p>
<p><span class="f_Format3"><a>AutoPlay</a></span></p>

<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">History</span></p>
<p style="margin: 0px 17px 0px 0px;">Fours Up is a member of the <a href="busy_aces.htm">Busy Aces</a> family.  Fours Up was invented by <a href="thomas_warfield.htm">Thomas Warfield</a>.</p>

# Foursome

<table cellpadding="5" cellspacing="0" width="100%">
<tbody><tr valign="middle">
<td>
<p class="p_Heading1"><span class="f_Heading1">Foursome</span></p>
</td>
<td>
<span style="font-size: 9pt">
<a href="contents.htm">Top</a> 
<a href="fours_up.htm">Previous</a> 
<a href="fourteen_demons.htm">Next</a>

<table cellpadding="5" cellspacing="0" width="100%"><tbody><tr valign="top"><td>
<p>1 Deck.  Hard (20%).  Mostly Skill.</p>

<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Object</span></p>
<p style="margin: 0px 17px 0px 0px;">To collect all the cards in sets of 4 cards of the same <a class="popuplink">rank</a>.</p>

<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Layout</span></p>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td>4 <a class="popuplink">cells</a> (top) - s<span class="f_Format3">torage location for one card.  No building.  When all 4 </span><a class="popuplink">cells</a> contain cards of the same <a class="popuplink">rank</a> (for example, 4 Jacks), then the 4 cards are removed from play.  At the start of the game 1 card is dealt to each pile.</td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td>6 <a class="popuplink">tableau</a> piles (below <a class="popuplink">cells</a>) - build <a class="popuplink">up or down by alternate color</a>, <a class="popuplink">wrapping</a> from Ace to King or King to Ace as necessary.  Only one card at a time may be moved.  Spaces can be filled by any card.  At the start of the game 1 card is dealt face up to each pile.</td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td><a class="popuplink">stock</a> (face down on left) - Deals 1 card to each <a class="popuplink">tableau</a> pile.</td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Options</span></p>
<p><span class="f_Format3"><a>AutoPlay</a></span></p>

<p><a href="quartet.htm">Quartet</a></p>
<p><a href="rank_freecell.htm">Rank FreeCell</a></p>
</td></tr></tbody></table>

# Fourteen Demons

<table cellpadding="5" cellspacing="0" width="100%">
<tbody><tr valign="middle">
<td>
<p class="p_Heading1"><span class="f_Heading1">Fourteen Demons</span></p>
</td>
<td>
<span style="font-size: 9pt">
<a href="contents.htm">Top</a> 
<a href="foursome.htm">Previous</a> 
<a href="fourteen_out.htm">Next</a>
</span>
</td>
</tr>
</tbody></table>
<table cellpadding="5" cellspacing="0" width="100%"><tbody><tr valign="top"><td>
<p style="margin: 0px 17px 0px 0px;">1 Deck.  Medium (80%).  Skill/Luck balanced.</p>

<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Object</span></p>
<p>To discard all the cards.</p>

<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Layout</span></p>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td>4 <a class="popuplink">tableau</a> piles - the top card is available for play.  Discard pairs of cards that have <a class="popuplink">ranks</a> that add to 14. Possible pairs are King-Ace, Queen-2, Jack-3, 10-4, 9-5, 8-6, 7-7.   <span class="f_Format3">Spaces are filled automatically from the </span><a class="popuplink">stock</a><span class="f_Format3">.  At the start of the game 1 card is dealt to each pile.</span></td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td><a class="popuplink">stock</a> (top left, face down) - turn over  3 cards at a time, by clicking.  Unlimited <a class="popuplink">redeals</a>.</td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td><a class="popuplink">waste</a> (next to <a class="popuplink">stock</a>) - top card available for pairing.</td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td><a class="popuplink">reserve</a> (left of <a class="popuplink">tableau</a>) - Top card always available for play.  At the start of the game 13 cards are dealt here.</td></tr></tbody></table></div>


<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Valid Discards</span></p>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td>A-K, 2-Q, 3-J, 4-10, 5-9, 6-8, 7-7</td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">History</span></p>
<p>Fourteen <span class="f_Format3">Demons is an addition game with a tableau like <a href="canfield.htm">Canfield</a>.</span></p>

<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Similar Games</span></p>
<p><a href="fifteen_rush.htm">Fifteen Rush</a></p>
<p><span class="f_Format3"><a href="canfield.htm">Canfield</a></span></p>
</td></tr></tbody></table>

# Fourteen Out

<table cellpadding="5" cellspacing="0" width="100%">
<tbody><tr valign="middle">
<td>
<p class="p_Heading1"><span class="f_Heading1">Fourteen Out</span></p>
</td>
<td>
<span style="font-size: 9pt">
<a href="contents.htm">Top</a> 
<a href="fourteen_demons.htm">Previous</a> 
<a href="fourteen_peaks.htm">Next</a>
</span>
</td>
</tr>
</tbody></table>
<table cellpadding="5" cellspacing="0" width="100%"><tbody><tr valign="top"><td>
<p style="margin: 0px 17px 0px 0px;">1 Deck.  Medium (50%).  Mostly Skill.</p>

<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Object</span></p>
<p style="margin: 0px 17px 0px 0px;">To pair up all cards and move them out of play to the <a class="popuplink">waste</a> pile.</p>

<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Layout</span></p>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td>12 <a class="popuplink">tableau</a> piles - the top card of each pile is available.  Pair cards that total to 14.  For example, a King and an Ace, a Queen and a 2, or an 8 and a 6.  To remove a pair, pick up one card with the mouse and drop it on the other.  At the start of the game 5 cards are dealt face up to each of the first 4 piles, 4 cards are dealt face up to each of the remaining piles.</td></tr></tbody></table></div><p style="text-indent: -24px; margin: 0px 17px 0px 36px;"><span style="color: #000000;"> </span></p>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 17px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td><a class="popuplink">waste</a> pile (bottom of screen) - where paired cards go out of play.</td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Notes</span></p>
<p><span class="f_Format3">Cards that pair to 14: King-Ace, Queen-2, Jack-3, 10-4, 9-5, 8-6, 7-7.</span></p>

<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">History</span></p>
<p>Fourteen Out is a simple game to play, and is fairly easy to win.</p>

<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Similar Games</span></p>
<p><a href="double_fourteens.htm">Double Fourteens</a></p>
<p><a href="triple_fourteens.htm">Triple Fourteens</a></p>
<p><a href="tens_out.htm">Tens Out</a></p>
<p><a href="thirteen_out.htm">Thirteen Out</a></p>
</td></tr></tbody></table>
