<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Object</span></p>
<p>To move all the cards to the <a class="popuplink">foundations</a>.</p>

<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Layout</span></p>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td>4 <a class="popuplink">foundation</a> piles (right) - build <a class="popuplink">up in suit</a> from Ace to King.</td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td>10 <a class="popuplink">tableau</a> piles (middle) - build <a class="popuplink">down by alternate color</a>.  Only one card at at time may be moved.  Fill spaces with any card.  At the start of the game 3 cards are dealt to each pile, 2 face down and 1 face up.</td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td><a class="popuplink">stock</a> (top left, face down) - turn over 3 cards at a time to the <a class="popuplink">waste</a> by clicking during the first deal, 2 cards at a time during the 2nd deal, and 1 card at a time during the last deal.  Two <a class="popuplink">redeals</a>.</td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td><a class="popuplink">waste</a> (below <a class="popuplink">stock</a>) - Top card always available for play on the <a class="popuplink">foundations</a> or <a class="popuplink">tableau</a>.</td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Options</span></p>

<p style="margin: 0px 17px 0px 0px;">2 Decks.  Hard (3%).  Mostly Skill.</p>

<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Object</span></p>
<p>To move all the cards to the <a class="popuplink">foundations</a>.</p>

<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Layout</span></p>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td>8 <a class="popuplink">foundation</a> piles (in center) - build leftmost 4 piles <a class="popuplink">up in suit</a> from Ace to King, build rightmost 4 piles <a class="popuplink">down in suit</a> from King to Ace.</td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td>8 <a class="popuplink">tableau</a> piles (to left and right of <a class="popuplink">foundations</a>) - build <a class="popuplink">up or down by suit</a>.  Spaces are filled from the <a class="popuplink">waste</a>.  At the start of the game 1 card is dealt to each pile.</td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td><a class="popuplink">stock</a> (upper left, face down) - 1 card at a time moved to the <a class="popuplink">waste</a> by clicking.  No <a class="popuplink">redeals</a>.</td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td><a class="popuplink">waste</a> (next to <a class="popuplink">stock</a>) - top card available for play on the <a class="popuplink">foundations</a> or <span class="f_Format3"><a class="popuplink">tableau</a></span>.</td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Options</span></p>

# Whistler

<table cellpadding="5" cellspacing="0" width="100%">
<tbody><tr valign="middle">
<td>
<p class="p_Heading1"><span class="f_Heading1">Whistler</span></p>
</td>
<td>
<span style="font-size: 9pt">
<a href="contents.htm">Top</a> 
<a href="wheatsheaf.htm">Previous</a> 
<a href="whitehead.htm">Next</a>
</span>
</td>
</tr>
</tbody></table>
<table cellpadding="5" cellspacing="0" width="100%"><tbody><tr valign="top"><td>
<p>1 Deck.  Medium (50%)  Mostly Skill.</p>

<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Object</span></p>
<p style="margin: 0px 17px 0px 0px;">To move all the cards to the <a class="popuplink">foundations</a>.</p>

<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Layout</span></p>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td>4 <a class="popuplink">foundation</a> piles (top right) - build <a class="popuplink">up in suit</a> from the <a class="popuplink">rank</a> of first card dealt to the first pile, <a class="popuplink">wrapping</a> from King to Ace as necessary, until each pile contains 13 cards.</td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td>6 <a class="popuplink">tableau</a> piles (below <a class="popuplink">foundations</a>) - build <a class="popuplink">down by alternate color</a>.  Move groups of cards if they are in sequence <a class="popuplink">down by alternate color</a>.  Spaces are filled from the <a class="popuplink">reserve</a> if possible, then by any card.  At the start of the game 1 card is dealt to each pile.</td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td><a class="popuplink">stock</a> (top left, face down) - turn over 3 cards at a time, by clicking.  Unlimited <a class="popuplink">redeals</a>.</td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td><a class="popuplink">waste</a> (next to <a class="popuplink">stock</a>) - Top card always available for play on the <a class="popuplink">tableau</a> or <a class="popuplink">foundations</a>.</td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td><a class="popuplink">reserve</a> (left of <a class="popuplink">tableau</a>) - Top card always available for play on the <a class="popuplink">tableau</a> or <a class="popuplink">foundations</a>.  At the start of the game 13 cards are dealt here.</td></tr></tbody></table></div>

<p><span class="f_Format3" style="font-weight: bold;">Options</span></p>
<p><span class="f_Format3"><a>AutoPlay</a></span></p>

<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">History</span></p>
<p>Whistler is an easier variation of the strict 3 card deal <a href="canfield.htm">Canfield</a>.  It is named after artist James Whistler, a friend of Richard Canfield.</p>

</td></tr></tbody></table>

<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Object</span></p>
<p>To move all the cards to the <a class="popuplink">foundations</a>.</p>

<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Layout</span></p>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td>4 <a class="popuplink">foundation</a> piles (top right) - build <a class="popuplink">up in suit</a> from Ace to King.</td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td>7 <a class="popuplink">tableau</a> piles (below <a class="popuplink">foundations</a>) - build <a class="popuplink">down by color</a>.  Move groups of cards if they are in sequence <a class="popuplink">down in suit</a>.  Fill spaces with any card or legal groups of cards.  At the start of the game 1 card is dealt face up to the first pile, 2 cards to the 2nd, and so on.</td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td><a class="popuplink">stock</a> (top left, face down) - turn over one card at a time to the <a class="popuplink">waste</a>, by clicking.  No <a class="popuplink">redeals</a>.</td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td><a class="popuplink">waste</a> (next to <a class="popuplink">stock</a>) - Top card always available for play on the <a class="popuplink">foundations</a> or <a class="popuplink">tableau</a>.</td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Options</span></p>
<p><span class="f_Format3"><a>AutoPlay</a></span></p>

<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">History</span></p>
<p>This is a variation of <a href="klondike.htm">Klondike</a>.  The ability to see all the cards in the <a class="popuplink">tableau</a> makes this game interesting.  It is more difficult to win than most of the <a href="klondike.htm">Klondike</a> variations.</p>

<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Similar Games</span></p>
<p><a href="klondike.htm">Klondike</a></p>
</td></tr></tbody></table>

<p>1 Deck.  Easy (98%).  Skill/Luck balanced.</p>

<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Object</span></p>
<p>To move all the cards to the <a class="popuplink">foundations</a>.</p>

<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Layout</span></p>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td>4 <a class="popuplink">foundation</a> piles (top right) - build <a class="popuplink">up in suit</a> from Ace to King.</td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td>7 <a class="popuplink">tableau</a> piles (below <a class="popuplink">foundations</a>) - build <a class="popuplink">down by alternate color</a>.  Move groups of cards if they are in sequence <a class="popuplink">down by alternate color</a>.  S<span class="f_Format3">paces are filled automatically from the </span><a class="popuplink">waste</a><span class="f_Format3"> or from the </span><a class="popuplink">stock</a><span class="f_Format3"> if the </span><a class="popuplink">waste</a><span class="f_Format3"> is empty. At the start of the game 1 card is dealt face up to each pile.</span></td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td><a class="popuplink">stock</a> (top left, face down) - turn over 3 cards at a time, by clicking.  Unlimited <a class="popuplink">redeals</a>.</td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td><a class="popuplink">waste</a> (next to <a class="popuplink">stock</a>) - top card available for play on the <a class="popuplink">foundations</a> or <a class="popuplink">tableau</a>.</td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Options</span></p>
<p><span class="f_Format3"><a>AutoPlay</a></span></p>

</td></tr></tbody></table>

# Wildflower

<table cellpadding="5" cellspacing="0" width="100%">
<tbody><tr valign="middle">
<td>
<p class="p_Heading1"><span class="f_Heading1">Wildflower</span></p>
</td>
<td>
<span style="font-size: 9pt">
<a href="contents.htm">Top</a>

</span>
</td>

<table cellpadding="5" cellspacing="0" width="100%"><tbody><tr valign="top"><td>
<p style="margin: 0px 17px 0px 0px;">1 Deck.  Easy (90%).  Mostly Skill.</p>

<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Object</span></p>
<p style="margin: 0px 17px 0px 0px;">To move all the cards to the <a class="popuplink">foundations</a>.</p>

<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Layout</span></p>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td>4 <a class="popuplink">foundation</a> piles (top right) - build <a class="popuplink">up in suit</a> from Ace to King.</td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td>6 <a class="popuplink">tableau</a> piles (below <a class="popuplink">foundations</a>) - build <a class="popuplink">down regardless of suit</a>.  Groups of cards may be moved as a unit if they are in sequence <a class="popuplink">down in suit</a>.  Spaces are filled by any card.  At the start of the game 6 cards are dealt face up to each pile.</td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td><a class="popuplink">reserve</a> (left) - All cards available for play on the <a class="popuplink">foundations</a> or <a class="popuplink">tableau</a>.  Click on card to move it to the bottom of the stack, then move to either the <a class="popuplink">foundations</a> or <a class="popuplink">tableau</a>.   At the start of the game 16 cards are dealt to this pile.</td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Options</span></p>
<p><span class="f_Format3"><a>AutoPlay</a></span></p>

<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">History</span></p>
<p>Wildflower is a variation of <a href="flower_garden.htm">Flower Garden</a>. </p>

# Will o the Wisp

<table cellpadding="5" cellspacing="0" width="100%">
<tbody><tr valign="middle">
<td>
<p class="p_Heading1"><span class="f_Heading1">Will o the Wisp</span></p>
</td>
<td>
<span style="font-size: 9pt">
<a href="contents.htm">Top</a> 
<a href="wildflower.htm">Previous</a> 
<a href="willow.htm">Next</a>
</span>
</td>
</tr>
</tbody></table>
<table cellpadding="5" cellspacing="0" width="100%"><tbody><tr valign="top"><td>
<p style="margin: 0px 17px 0px 0px;">1 Deck.  Hard (19%).  Skill/luck balanced.</p>

<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Object</span></p>
<p>To group all the cards in sets of 13 cards in sequence <a class="popuplink">down in suit</a> from King to Ace.</p>

<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Layout</span></p>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td>7 <a class="popuplink">tableau</a> piles - build <a class="popuplink">down regardless of suit</a>.  Groups of cards in sequence <a class="popuplink">down in suit</a> may be moved as a unit.  A space can be filled by any card or legal group of cards. <span class="f_Format3">At the start of the game 3 cards are dealt to each pile, 2 face down and 1 face up.</span></td></tr></tbody></table></div><p><span class="f_Format3"> </span></p>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td><a class="popuplink">stock</a> (above the <a class="popuplink">tableau</a>) - Clicking deals 1 card to each <a class="popuplink">tableau</a> pile.  All empty spaces must be filled before a deal.</td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Notes</span></p>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td>Whenever a sequence of 13 cards <a class="popuplink">down in suit</a> from King to Ace is formed, it will automatically be removed from play.</td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Tips</span></p>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td><span class="f_Format3">Same suit sequences should be preferred even though building is <a class="popuplink">down regardless of suit</a>.  The object is to build <a class="popuplink">down in suit</a> sequences.</span></td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">History</span></p>
<p style="margin: 0px 17px 0px 0px;">Will o' the Wisp is a variation of <a href="spiderette.htm">Spiderette</a> where the cards are dealt in the same fashion as <a href="easthaven.htm">EastHaven</a>.  With fewer face down cards to clear, the game becomes slightly easier.  Will o the Wisp was invented by <a href="albert_morehead.htm">Albert Morehead and Geoffrey Mott-Smith</a> in their book <a href="morehead_mottsmith.htm">The Complete Book of Solitaire &amp; Patience Games</a> in 1949.</p>

<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Similar Games</span></p>
<p><a href="spiderette.htm">Spiderette</a></p>
<p><a href="easthaven.htm">EastHaven</a></p>
</td></tr></tbody></table>

<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td>4 <a class="popuplink">foundation</a> piles (top right) - build <a class="popuplink">up in suit</a> from Ace to King.</td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td>7 <a class="popuplink">tableau</a> piles (below <a class="popuplink">foundations</a>) - build <a class="popuplink">down by alternate color</a>.  Move groups of cards if they are in sequence <a class="popuplink">down by alternate color</a>.  Fill spaces with any card or legal group of cards.  At the start of the game 1 card is dealt face up to the first pile, 2 cards to the 2nd pile, and so on.</td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td>4 <a class="popuplink">fans</a> (left) - top card is available for play on the <a class="popuplink">foundations</a> or <a class="popuplink">tableau</a> or other <a class="popuplink">fans</a>.  Build cards of same <a class="popuplink">rank</a>. Spaces cannot be filled.  At the start of the game 6 cards are dealt face up to each pile.</td></tr></tbody></table></div>

# Windmill

<table cellpadding="5" cellspacing="0" width="100%">
<tbody><tr valign="middle">
<td>
<p class="p_Heading1"><span class="f_Heading1">Windmill</span></p>
</td>
<td>
<span style="font-size: 9pt">
<a href="contents.htm">Top</a> 
<a href="willow.htm">Previous</a> 
<a href="windsor_castle.htm">Next</a>
</span>
</td>
</tr>
</tbody></table>
<table cellpadding="5" cellspacing="0" width="100%"><tbody><tr valign="top"><td>
<p style="margin: 0px 17px 0px 0px;">2 Decks.  Hard (18%).  Mostly Luck.</p>

<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Object</span></p>
<p>To move all the cards to the <a class="popuplink">foundations</a>.</p>

<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Layout</span></p>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td>5 <a class="popuplink">foundation</a> piles (1 in center, 4 others diagonally around it) - on the center <a class="popuplink">foundation</a>, which at the start of the game is dealt an Ace, build <a class="popuplink">up regardless of suit</a>, <a class="popuplink">wrapping</a> from King to Ace as necessary, until it contains 52 cards. On the other 4 <a class="popuplink">foundations</a>,  build <a class="popuplink">down regardless of suit</a> from King to Ace.</td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td>8 <a class="popuplink">tableau</a> piles (extending in all 4 directions from the center <a class="popuplink">foundation</a>) - each pile may contain 1 card.  Spaces are filled immediately from the <a class="popuplink">waste</a> or <a class="popuplink">stock</a>.  At the start of the game 1 card is dealt face up to each pile.</td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td><a class="popuplink">stock</a> (top left, face down) - turn over 1 card at a time to the <a class="popuplink">waste</a> by clicking.  No <a class="popuplink">redeals</a>.</td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td><a class="popuplink">waste</a> (next to <a class="popuplink">stock</a>) - the top card is available for play on the <a class="popuplink">foundations</a> or <a class="popuplink">tableau</a>.</td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Options</span></p>
<p><span class="f_Format3"><a>AutoPlay</a></span></p>

<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">History</span></p>
<p>Windmill is also known as Propeller.  Feed the big center pile every time you can.</p>

<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Similar Games</span></p>
<p><a href="dutch_solitaire.htm">Dutch Solitaire</a></p>
</td></tr></tbody></table>

<table cellpadding="5" cellspacing="0" width="100%"><tbody><tr valign="top"><td>
<p style="margin: 0px 17px 0px 0px;">1 Deck.  Hard (10%).  Mostly Skill.</p>

<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Object</span></p>
<p>To move all the cards to the <a class="popuplink">foundations</a>.</p>

<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Layout</span></p>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td>4 <a class="popuplink">foundation</a> piles (middle) - build <a class="popuplink">up in suit</a> from Ace to King. </td></tr></tbody></table></div><p style="text-indent: -13px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 13px;"><span style="color: #000000;"> </span></p>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td>10 <a class="popuplink">tableau</a> piles (around <a class="popuplink">foundations</a>) - build <a class="popuplink">up or down by suit</a>.  Only the top card of each pile is available for play.  Spaces may be filled by any available card.  At the start of the game 5 cards are dealt face up to each pile (6 cards to the first two piles).</td></tr></tbody></table></div>

<p style="margin: 0px 17px 0px 0px;">1 Deck.  Hard (15%).  Mostly Skill.</p>

<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Object</span></p>
<p>To move all the cards to the <a class="popuplink">foundations</a>.</p>

<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Layout</span></p>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td>4 <a class="popuplink">foundation</a> piles (top) - build <a class="popuplink">up in suit</a> from Ace to King.</td></tr></tbody></table></div><p style="text-indent: -24px; margin: 0px 17px 0px 36px;"><span style="color: #000000;"> </span></p>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 17px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td>10 <a class="popuplink">tableau</a> piles (below <a class="popuplink">foundations</a>) - build <a class="popuplink">down by alternate color</a>.  Only one card at a time may be moved.  Spaces are filled by any card.  At the start of the game 5 cards are dealt face up to each pile.</td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td>2 <a class="popuplink">cells</a> (top left) - storage locations for cards.  Only 1 card allowed in each <a class="popuplink">cell</a>.  At the start of the game 1 card is dealt to each <a class="popuplink">cell</a>.</td></tr></tbody></table></div>

# Wings

<table cellpadding="5" cellspacing="0" width="100%"><tbody><tr valign="top"><td>
<p style="margin: 0px 17px 0px 0px;">1 Deck.  Medium (40%).  Mostly Luck.</p>

<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Object</span></p>
<p>To move all the cards to the <a class="popuplink">foundations</a>.</p>

<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Layout</span></p>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td>4 <a class="popuplink">foundation</a> piles (top) - build <a class="popuplink">up in suit</a> from the <a class="popuplink">rank</a> of first card dealt to the first pile, <a class="popuplink">wrapping</a> from King to Ace as necessary, until each pile contains 13 cards. </td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td>8 <a class="popuplink">tableau</a> piles (the wings) - build <a class="popuplink">down in suit</a>, <a class="popuplink">wrapping</a> from Ace to King as necessary. Only one card at a time may be moved.  Spaces are filled from the <a class="popuplink">reserve</a> (or Trunk) until it is empty, then by any card.  At the start of the game 1 card is dealt face up to each pile.</td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td><a class="popuplink">reserve</a> or Trunk (middle) - cards may be moved to the <a class="popuplink">foundations</a> or <a class="popuplink">tableau</a>.  At the start of the game 13 cards are dealt here.</td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td><a class="popuplink">stock</a> (face down, bottom left) - turn over cards one at a time to the <a class="popuplink">waste</a> by clicking.  No <a class="popuplink">redeals</a>.</td></tr></tbody></table></div><p style="text-indent: -24px; margin: 0px 17px 0px 36px;"><span style="color: #000000;"> </span></p>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 17px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td><a class="popuplink">waste</a> (next to <a class="popuplink">stock</a>) - top card is available for play on the <a class="popuplink">foundations</a> or <a class="popuplink">tableau</a>.</td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Options</span></p>
<p><span class="f_Format3"><a>AutoPlay</a></span></p>

<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">History</span></p>
<p>Wings is a variation of <a href="eagle_wing.htm">Eagle Wing</a>.</p>

<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Similar Games</span></p>
<p><a href="eagle_wing.htm">Eagle Wing</a></p>
<p><a href="bald_eagle.htm">Bald Eagle</a></p>
</td></tr></tbody></table>

</td>

<table cellpadding="5" cellspacing="0" width="100%"><tbody><tr valign="top"><td>
<p style="margin: 0px 17px 0px 0px;">2 Decks.  Hard (30%).  Skill/Luck balanced.</p>

<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Object</span></p>
<p>To move all the cards to the <a class="popuplink">foundations</a><span class="f_Format3">.</span></p>

<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Layout</span></p>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td>8 <a class="popuplink">foundation</a> piles (middle) - build <a class="popuplink">up by alternate color</a>, <a class="popuplink">wrapping</a> from King to Ace as necessary, until each pile contains 13 cards.</td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td>8 <a class="popuplink">tableau</a> piles (below <a class="popuplink">foundations</a>) - build <a class="popuplink">down by alternate color</a>.  Only the top card of each pile may be moved.  Spaces may be filled only from the <a class="popuplink">waste</a> pile.  At the start of the game 1 card is dealt face up to each pile.</td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td><a class="popuplink">reserve</a> (top) - top card is available for play on the <a class="popuplink">foundations</a> only.  At the start of the game 10 cards are dealt to this pile.</td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td><a class="popuplink">stock</a> (top left, face down) - turn over cards 1 at a time to the <a class="popuplink">waste</a> by clicking.  No <a class="popuplink">redeals</a>.</td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td><a class="popuplink">waste</a> (next to <a class="popuplink">stock</a>) - top card is available for play on the <a class="popuplink">foundations</a> or <a class="popuplink">tableau</a>.</td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Options</span></p>
<p><span class="f_Format3"><a>AutoPlay</a></span></p>

<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">History</span></p>
<p>W<span class="f_Format3">ood is in the </span><a href="terrace.htm">Terrace</a><span class="f_Format3"> family of games.  It is closely related to <a href="falling_star.htm">Falling Star</a> and <a href="blondes_and_brunettes.htm">Blondes and Brunettes</a>. </span></p>

<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Similar Games</span></p>

<p><a href="terrace.htm">Terrace</a></p>


</td></tr></tbody></table>

# Wood Scorpion

<table cellpadding="5" cellspacing="0" width="100%">
<tbody><tr valign="middle">
<td>
<p class="p_Heading1"><span class="f_Heading1">Wood Scorpion</span></p>
</td>
<td>
<span style="font-size: 9pt">
<a href="contents.htm">Top</a> 
<a href="wood.htm">Previous</a> 
<a href="worldly.htm">Next</a>
</span>
</td>
</tr>
</tbody></table>
<table cellpadding="5" cellspacing="0" width="100%"><tbody><tr valign="top"><td>
<p style="margin: 0px 17px 0px 0px;">1 Deck.  Medium (50%).  Mostly Skill.</p>

<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Object</span></p>
<p>To group all the cards into 4 sets of 13 cards in sequence <a class="popuplink">down in suit</a> from King to Ace within the <a class="popuplink">tableau</a>.</p>

<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Layout</span></p>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td>8 <a class="popuplink">tableau</a> piles (top) - build <a class="popuplink">down in suit</a>.  Groups of cards (regardless of any sequence) can be moved.  Fill spaces with Kings or groups of cards headed by a King.  At the start of the game 5 cards are dealt to each pile.  In the first 4 piles, 3 cards are face down and 2 face up, in the next 6 piles all cards are face up.</td></tr></tbody></table></div><p style="text-indent: -24px; margin: 0px 17px 0px 36px;"><span style="color: #000000;"> </span></p>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 17px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td><a class="popuplink">reserve</a> (top left, face down) - Clicking deals 1 card to each of the first 7 <a class="popuplink">tableau</a> piles (this can be done only once).</td></tr></tbody></table></div>

<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Notes</span></p>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 17px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td>Any face up card, regardless of where in a pile it is, can be moved, along with all cards above it (this is like <a href="yukon.htm">Yukon</a>).</td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Tips</span></p>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td>It is imperative that the face down cards be uncovered as soon as possible.  There are often several choices of builds to make and it is beneficial to work through possibilities.  This is very much a game of skill, and it is difficult.</td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">History</span></p>
<p>Wood Scorpion is an 9 pile version of <a href="scorpion.htm">Scorpion</a> invented by <a href="thomas_warfield.htm">Thomas Warfield</a>.</p>

<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Similar Games</span></p>
<p><a href="scorpion.htm">Scorpion</a></p>
<p><a href="serket.htm">Serket</a></p>
</td></tr></tbody></table>

<table cellpadding="5" cellspacing="0" width="100%"><tbody><tr valign="top"><td>
<p>1 Deck.  Easy (90%).  Skill/Luck balanced.</p>

<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Object</span></p>
<p>To move all the cards to the <a class="popuplink">foundations</a>.</p>

<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Layout</span></p>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td>4 <a class="popuplink">foundation</a> piles (top right) - build <a class="popuplink">up in suit</a> from Ace to King.</td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td>7 <a class="popuplink">tableau</a> piles (below <a class="popuplink">foundations</a>) - build <a class="popuplink">down by any suit but the same</a>.  Move groups of cards if they are in sequence <a class="popuplink">down by any suit but the same</a>.  Fill spaces with Kings or a group of cards headed by a King. <span class="f_Format3">At the start of the game 1 card is dealt to the first pile, 2 cards to the 2nd, and so on.  The top card is face up.</span></td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td><a class="popuplink">stock</a> (top left, face down) - turn over 3 cards at a time to the <a class="popuplink">waste</a> by clicking during the first deal, 2 cards at a time during the 2nd deal, and 1 card at a time during the last deal.  Two <a class="popuplink">redeals</a>.</td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td><a class="popuplink">waste</a> (next to <a class="popuplink">stock</a>) - top card available for play on the <a class="popuplink">foundations</a> or <a class="popuplink">tableau</a>.</td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Options</span></p>
<p><span class="f_Format3"><a>AutoPlay</a></span></p>

<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">History</span></p>
<p>Worldly is an easy variation of <span class="f_Format3"><a href="gold_rush.htm">Gold Rush</a>. </span></p>

<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Similar Games</span></p>

</td></tr></tbody></table>

# XV

<table cellpadding="5" cellspacing="0" width="100%">
<tbody><tr valign="middle">
<td>
<p class="p_Heading1"><span class="f_Heading1">XV</span></p>
</td>
<td>
<span style="font-size: 9pt">

<table cellpadding="5" cellspacing="0" width="100%"><tbody><tr valign="top"><td>
<p style="margin: 0px 17px 0px 0px;">1 Deck.  Medium (30%).  Mostly Luck.</p>

<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Object</span></p>
<p>To discard all the cards.</p>

<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Layout</span></p>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td>13 <a class="popuplink">tableau</a> piles - the top card is available for play.  Discard pairs of cards that have <a class="popuplink">ranks</a> that add to 15. Aces are discarded in pairs.  Spaces are automatically filled from the <a class="popuplink">stock</a> in the center 3 piles, otherwise in the outer 10 piles spaces are not filled.   At the start of the game 3 cards are dealt face up to 10 piles, 1 card is dealt face up to the center 3 piles.</td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td><a class="popuplink">stock</a> (face down, left) - fills spaces in the <a class="popuplink">tableau</a>.</td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td><a class="popuplink">waste</a> (lower left)  - Where paired cards go out of play.</td></tr></tbody></table></div>

<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Valid Discards</span></p>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td>A-A, 2-K, 3-Q, 4-J, 5-10, 6-9, 7-8</td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">History</span></p>
<p>XV is a variation of <a href="friday.htm">Friday</a> and <a href="seventeens.htm">Seventeens</a>.</p>

<table cellpadding="5" cellspacing="0" width="100%"><tbody><tr valign="top"><td>
<p>1 Deck.  Medium (75%).  Skill/Luck balanced.</p>

<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Object</span></p>
<p>To move all the cards to the <a class="popuplink">foundations</a>.</p>

<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Layout</span></p>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td>4 <a class="popuplink">foundation</a> piles (top right) - build <a class="popuplink">up in suit</a> from Ace to King.</td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td>7 <a class="popuplink">tableau</a> piles (below <a class="popuplink">foundations</a>) - build <a class="popuplink">down by alternate color</a>.  Move groups of cards if they are in sequence <a class="popuplink">down by alternate color</a>.  Fill spaces with any card or groups of cards. <span class="f_Format3">  At the start of the game 1 card is dealt to the first pile, 2 cards to the 2nd, and so on.  All cards are dealt face up.</span></td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td><a class="popuplink">stock</a> (top left, face down) - turn over 1 cards at a time, by clicking.  Unlimited <a class="popuplink">redeals</a>.</td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td><a class="popuplink">waste</a> (next to <a class="popuplink">stock</a>) - top card available for play on the <a class="popuplink">foundations</a> or <a class="popuplink">tableau</a>.</td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Options</span></p>
<p><span class="f_Format3"><a>AutoPlay</a></span></p>

<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">History</span></p>
<p><span class="f_Format3">Yorktown is <a href="klondike.htm">Klondike</a> with all the cards in the </span><a class="popuplink">tableau</a><span class="f_Format3"> visible.</span></p>

</td></tr></tbody></table>

<p style="margin: 0px 17px 0px 0px;">2 Decks.  Medium (30%).  Mostly Skill.</p>

<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Object</span></p>
<p>To move all the cards to the <a class="popuplink">foundations</a>.</p>

<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Layout</span></p>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td>4 <a class="popuplink">foundation</a> piles (right) - build <a class="popuplink">up in suit</a> from Ace to King, <a class="popuplink">wrapping</a> to Ace and then to King again, until each pile contains 26 cards. </td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td>7 <a class="popuplink">tableau</a> piles (across top) - build <a class="popuplink">down by alternate color</a>, <a class="popuplink">wrapping</a> from Ace to King if necessary.   Move groups of cards regardless of any sequence. Spaces may be filled by any card or group of cards (All spaces must be filled before cards are dealt from the <a class="popuplink">stock</a>).  At the start of the game 1 card is dealt to the 1st and 7th piles, 2 cards to the 2nd and 6th, 3 cards to the 3rd and 5th, and 4 cards to the 4th pile.</td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td><a class="popuplink">stock</a> (top left, face down) - deals 1 card to each <a class="popuplink">tableau</a> pile by clicking.  When only 4 cards remain, 1 card is dealt to each of the <span class="f_Format3"><a class="popuplink">reserve</a> piles. No <a class="popuplink">redeals</a>.</span></td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td>4 <a class="popuplink">reserve</a> piles (below <a class="popuplink">stock</a>) - cards are dealt here from the <a class="popuplink">stock</a> when the <a class="popuplink">stock</a> contains only 4 cards.  The cards are available for play on the <a class="popuplink">foundations</a> or <a class="popuplink">tableau</a>.<span style="font-weight: bold;"> </span>No building.</td></tr></tbody></table></div>

</td></tr></tbody></table>

<table cellpadding="5" cellspacing="0" width="100%"><tbody><tr valign="top"><td>
<p style="margin: 0px 17px 0px 0px;">1 Deck.  Medium (35%).  Mostly Skill.</p>

<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Object</span></p>
<p>To move all the cards to the <a class="popuplink">foundations</a>.</p>

<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Layout</span></p>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td>4 <a class="popuplink">foundation</a> piles (top right) - build <a class="popuplink">up in suit</a> from Ace to King.</td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td>7 <a class="popuplink">tableau</a> piles (below <a class="popuplink">foundations</a>) - build <a class="popuplink">down by alternate color</a>.  Move groups of cards regardless of any sequence.  Fill spaces with Kings or groups of cards headed by a King.   At the start of the game 1 card is dealt the first pile, 2 cards to the 2nd pile, and so on.  The top card is face up.  Then 4 additional face up cards are dealt to the 2nd through 7th piles.</td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Options</span></p>
<p><span class="f_Format3"><a>AutoPlay</a></span></p>

<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Notes</span></p>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 17px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td>Any face up card in the <a class="popuplink">tableau</a> may be built upon another, no matter how deep it is in a pile.  All cards covering it are moved together.  When a face down card is uncovered, it is automatically turned face up and is available for play. </td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Tips</span></p>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td>Uncover the face down cards as soon as possible.  Don't let one <a class="popuplink">foundation</a> get too far ahead of the others. </td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">History</span></p>
<p>Yukon is a variation of <a href="klondike.htm">Klondike</a>. <span class="f_Format3"><a href="russian_solitaire.htm">Russian Solitaire</a></span> is the same game except with building <a class="popuplink">down in suit</a>, making it much harder.  Yukon originally appeared in the 1949 book <a href="morehead_mottsmith.htm">The Complete Book of Solitaire &amp; Patience Games</a>.</p>

<p style="margin: 0px 17px 0px 0px;">1 Deck.  Medium (70%).  Mostly Skill.</p>

<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Object</span></p>
<p>To move all the cards to the <a class="popuplink">foundations</a>.</p>

<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Layout</span></p>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td>4 <a class="popuplink">foundation</a> piles (top right) - build <a class="popuplink">up in suit</a> from Ace to King.</td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td>7 <a class="popuplink">tableau</a> piles (below <a class="popuplink">foundations</a>) - build <a class="popuplink">down by alternate color</a>.  Move groups of cards regardless of any sequence.  Fill spaces with Kings or groups of cards headed by a King.   At the start of the game 1 card is dealt the first pile, 2 cards to the 2nd pile, and so on.  The top card is face up.  Then 4 additional face up cards are dealt to the 2nd through 7th piles.</td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td>2 <a class="popuplink">cells</a> (above <a class="popuplink">tableau</a>) - storage locations for cards.  The top card is available for play on the <a class="popuplink">foundations</a> or <a class="popuplink">tableau</a>.  A group of cards may be moved to a <a class="popuplink">cell</a> as a unit, but they can only be removed from the <a class="popuplink">cell</a> one card at a time.</td></tr></tbody></table></div>

<p>To group all the cards into 4 sets of 13 cards in sequence <a class="popuplink">down by alternate color</a> from King to Ace.</p>


<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Layout</span></p>

<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Options</span></p>
<p><span class="f_Format3"><a>AutoPlay</a></span></p>

<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Notes</span></p>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 17px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td>Any face up card in the <a class="popuplink">tableau</a> may be built upon another, no matter how deep it is in a pile.  All cards covering it are moved together.  When a face down card is uncovered, it is automatically turned face up and is available for play. </td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">History</span></p>
<p>Yukon Kings is <a href="yukon_spider.htm">Yukon Spider</a> with the additional ability to play Kings on Aces, making the game somewhat easier.</p>

<table cellpadding="5" cellspacing="0" width="100%"><tbody><tr valign="top"><td>
<p style="margin: 0px 17px 0px 0px;">1 Modified Deck (All Spades).  Easy (99%).  Mostly Skill.</p>

<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Object</span></p>
<p>To move all the cards to the <a class="popuplink">foundations</a>.</p>

<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Layout</span></p>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td>4 <a class="popuplink">foundation</a> piles (top right) - build up from Ace to King.</td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td>7 <a class="popuplink">tableau</a> piles (below <a class="popuplink">foundations</a>) - build down.  Move groups of cards regardless of any sequence.  Fill spaces with Kings or groups of cards headed by a King.   At the start of the game 1 card is dealt the first pile, 2 cards to the 2nd pile, and so on.  The top card is face up.  Then 4 additional face up cards are dealt to the 2nd through 7th piles.</td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Options</span></p>
<p><span class="f_Format3"><a>AutoPlay</a></span></p>

<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Notes</span></p>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 17px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td>Any face up card in the <a class="popuplink">tableau</a> may be built upon another, no matter how deep it is in a pile.  All cards covering it are moved together.  When a face down card is uncovered, it is automatically turned face up and is available for play. </td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Tips</span></p>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td>Uncover the face down cards as soon as possible.  Don't let one <a class="popuplink">foundation</a> get too far ahead of the others. </td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">History</span></p>
<p>Yukon One Suit is a simple variation of <a href="yukon.htm">Yukon</a>.</p>

# Yukon Puzzle

<table cellpadding="5" cellspacing="0" width="100%">

<p class="p_Heading1"><span class="f_Heading1">Yukon Puzzle</span></p>
</td>
<td>
<span style="font-size: 9pt">
<a href="contents.htm">Top</a> 
<a href="yukon_one_suit.htm">Previous</a> 
<a href="yukon_spider.htm">Next</a>
</span>
</td>

<table cellpadding="5" cellspacing="0" width="100%"><tbody><tr valign="top"><td>
<p style="margin: 0px 17px 0px 0px;">2 Decks.  Very Easy (95%).  Mostly Skill.</p>

<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Object</span></p>
<p style="margin: 0px 17px 0px 0px;">To move one deck of cards to the <a class="popuplink">foundations</a>, to move the other deck of cards into 13 piles of 4 cards of the same <a class="popuplink">rank</a>.</p>

<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Layout</span></p>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td>4 <a class="popuplink">foundation</a> piles (top middle) - build <a class="popuplink">up in suit</a> from Ace to King.  At the start of the game an Ace of each suit are dealt here.</td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td>7 <a class="popuplink">tableau</a> piles (below <a class="popuplink">foundations</a>) - build <a class="popuplink">down by alternate color</a>.  Move groups of cards regardless of any sequence.  Fill spaces with Kings or groups of cards headed by a King.   At the start of the game 1 card is dealt the first pile, 2 cards to the 2nd pile, and so on.  The top card is face up.  Then 4 additional face up cards are dealt to the 2nd through 7th piles.</td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td>15 <a class="popuplink">reserve</a> piles (on right - 3 begin empty) - Cards may be played on other cards of the same <a class="popuplink">rank</a>.  At most 4 cards are allowed in any pile.  Empty piles may be filled by any card.  At the start of the game 4 cards are dealt face up to 12 of the piles.</td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Options</span></p>
<p><span class="f_Format3"><a>AutoPlay</a></span></p>

<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Notes</span></p>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 17px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td>Any face up card in the <a class="popuplink">tableau</a> may be built upon another, no matter how deep it is in a pile.  All cards covering it are moved together.  When a face down card is uncovered, it is automatically turned face up and is available for play. </td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td><span class="f_Format3">In the </span><a class="popuplink">reserve</a> piles, cards may be played on other cards of the same rank.  For example, if the top card of a pile is a Three, another Three can be played on top of it.  The object is to move the cards so that there are 13 piles of 4 cards of the same <a class="popuplink">rank</a>, that is, one pile of 4 Kings, one pile of 4 Queens, and so on.  Note that the 4 cards must all be of different suits.</td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">History</span></p>
<p>Yukon Puzzle is a combination of the games <a href="yukon.htm">Yukon</a> and <a href="fifteen_puzzle.htm">Fifteen Puzzle</a>.  It was invented by <a href="thomas_warfield.htm">Thomas Warfield</a>.</p>

<p><a href="fifteen_puzzle.htm">Fifteen Puzzle</a></p>
<p><a href="klondike_puzzle.htm">Klondike Puzzle</a></p>
<p><a href="interchange_puzzle.htm">Interchange Puzzle</a></p>
</td></tr></tbody></table>

<p><span class="f_Format3"><a>AutoPlay</a></span></p>

<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Notes</span></p>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 17px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td>Any face up card in the <a class="popuplink">tableau</a> may be built upon another, no matter how deep it is in a pile.  All cards covering it are moved together.  When a face down card is uncovered, it is automatically turned face up and is available for play. </td></tr></tbody></table></div>

# Yukonic Plague

<table cellpadding="5" cellspacing="0" width="100%">
<tbody><tr valign="middle">
<td>
<p class="p_Heading1"><span class="f_Heading1">Yukonic Plague</span></p>
</td>
<td>
<span style="font-size: 9pt">
<a href="contents.htm">Top</a> 
<a href="yukon_two_suits.htm">Previous</a> 
<a href="z.htm">Next</a>
</span>
</td>
</tr>
</tbody></table>
<table cellpadding="5" cellspacing="0" width="100%"><tbody><tr valign="top"><td>
<p style="margin: 0px 17px 0px 0px;">1 Deck.  Hard (15%).  Mostly Skill.</p>

<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Object</span></p>
<p>To move all the cards to the <a class="popuplink">foundations</a>.</p>

<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Layout</span></p>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td>4 <a class="popuplink">foundation</a> piles (top right) - build <a class="popuplink">up in suit</a> from Ace to King.</td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td>7 <a class="popuplink">tableau</a> piles (below <a class="popuplink">foundations</a>) - build <a class="popuplink">down by alternate color</a>.  Move groups of cards regardless of any sequence.  Fill spaces with Kings or groups of cards headed by a King.   At the start of the game 1 card is dealt the first pile, 2 face down cards are dealt to the remaining piles, then 2 face up cards are dealt to the 2nd pile, 3 face up to the 3rd, 4 to the 4th, 5 to the 5th, and 6 to the 6th and 7th piles.</td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td><a class="popuplink">reserve</a> (left of <a class="popuplink">foundations</a>) - Top card always available for play on the <a class="popuplink">tableau</a> or <a class="popuplink">foundations</a>.  At the start of the game 13 cards are dealt here.</td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Options</span></p>
<p><span class="f_Format3"><a>AutoPlay</a></span></p>

<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Notes</span></p>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 17px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td>Any face up card in the <a class="popuplink">tableau</a> may be built upon another, no matter how deep it is in a pile.  All cards covering it are moved together.  When a face down card is uncovered, it is automatically turned face up and is available for play. </td></tr></tbody></table></div>

<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">History</span></p>
<p>Yukonic Plague is a variation of <a href="yukon.htm">Yukon</a>, with the same rules but a different opening layout, plus a <a class="popuplink">reserve</a>.  The result is that more cards begin out of play, which makes the game harder than <a href="yukon.htm">Yukon</a>.  Getting the cards in the <a class="popuplink">reserve</a> and the face down cards in the <a class="popuplink">tableau</a> into play is crucial in this game.</p>

<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Similar Games</span></p>
<p><a href="yukon.htm">Yukon</a></p>
<p><span class="f_Format3"><a href="russian_solitaire.htm">Russian Solitaire</a></span></p>
</td></tr></tbody></table>

# Zerline
