<table cellpadding="5" cellspacing="0" width="100%"><tbody><tr valign="top"><td>
<p style="margin: 0px 17px 0px 0px;">2 Decks.  Medium (55%).  Mostly Skill.</p>

<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Object</span></p>
<p>To move all the cards to the <a class="popuplink">foundations</a>.</p>

<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Layout</span></p>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td>8 <a class="popuplink">foundation</a> piles (center) - build <a class="popuplink">up in suit</a> from Kings, then Aces up to Queens.</td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td>8 <a class="popuplink">tableau</a> piles (left and right) - build <a class="popuplink">down regardless of suit</a>.  Only one card at a time may be moved.  Spaces are filled only with Queens.  At the start of the game 5 cards are dealt face up to each pile.</td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td> <a class="popuplink">stock</a> (top face down) - Turn over 1 card at a time to the <a class="popuplink">waste</a> by clicking.  No <a class="popuplink">redeals</a>.</td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td> <a class="popuplink">waste</a> (next to <a class="popuplink">stock</a>) - Top card is available for play on the <a class="popuplink">foundations</a> or <a class="popuplink">tableau</a><span class="f_Format3">.</span></td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td><a class="popuplink">reserve</a> (to right of <a class="popuplink">waste</a>) - storage location for up to 4 cards.  Only the top card is available for play on the <a class="popuplink">foundations</a> or <a class="popuplink">tableau</a>.  Any available card from the <a class="popuplink">tableau</a> (not <a class="popuplink">waste</a>) may be played to the <a class="popuplink">reserve</a>.</td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Options</span></p>
<p><span class="f_Format3"><a>AutoPlay</a></span></p>

<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">History</span></p>
<p>Zerline is of German origin.</p>

</td></tr></tbody></table>

<table cellpadding="5" cellspacing="0" width="100%"><tbody><tr valign="top"><td>
<p style="margin: 0px 17px 0px 0px;">2 Decks.  Medium (30%).  Skill/Luck balanced.</p>

<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Object</span></p>
<p>To move all the cards to the <a class="popuplink">foundations</a>.</p>

<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Layout</span></p>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td>Odds <a class="popuplink">foundations</a> (top) - build up in suit by twos, starting with Aces. (Ace, Three, Five, Seven, Nine, Jack, King).  At the start of the game the Aces are dealt here.</td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td>Evens <a class="popuplink">foundations</a> (under Odds) - build up in suit by twos, starting with Twos. (Two, Four, Six, Eight, Ten, Queen).  At the start of the game the Twos are dealt here.</td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td>9 <a class="popuplink">tableau</a> piles (under Evens) - top card is available for play on the <a class="popuplink">foundations</a>.  Build down in suit by twos.  Groups of cards in sequence down in suit by twos may be moved as a unit.  Spaces are filled from the <a class="popuplink">stock</a>, when the <a class="popuplink">stock</a> is empty spaces are filled by Kings or Queens only, or groups headed by a King or a Queen.  At the start of the game 4 cards are dealt face up to each pile.</td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td><a class="popuplink">stock</a> (left, face down) - Deals one card to each <a class="popuplink">tableau</a> pile by clicking.</td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Options</span></p>

# Zodiac

<table cellpadding="5" cellspacing="0" width="100%">
<tbody><tr valign="middle">
<td>
<p class="p_Heading1"><span class="f_Heading1">Zodiac</span></p>
</td>
<td>
<span style="font-size: 9pt">
<a href="contents.htm">Top</a>

<a href="solitaire_wizard.htm">Next</a>
</span>
</td>

<table cellpadding="5" cellspacing="0" width="100%"><tbody><tr valign="top"><td>
<p>2 Decks.  Medium (40%).  Mostly Skill.</p>

<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Object</span></p>
<p>To move all the cards to the <a class="popuplink">foundations</a>.</p>

<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Layout</span></p>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td>8 <a class="popuplink">foundation</a> piles (middle, upper and lower)  - build the upper 4 piles <a class="popuplink">up in suit</a> from Ace to King (one for each suit), the lower 4 <a class="popuplink">down in suit</a> from King to Ace (one for each suit).  No cards can be played to the <a class="popuplink">foundations</a><span class="f_Format3"> until the </span><a class="popuplink">stock</a><span class="f_Format3"> and <a class="popuplink">waste</a> are empty.</span></td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td>8 <a class="popuplink">reserve</a> piles, also known as the "Equator" (center) - storage location for one card.   Only 1 card allowed in each <a class="popuplink">reserve</a>.  The card is available for play on the <a class="popuplink">tableau</a> piles, and on the <a class="popuplink">foundations</a><span class="f_Format3"> when the </span><a class="popuplink">stock</a><span class="f_Format3"> and <a class="popuplink">waste</a> are empty. </span> At the start of the game 1 card is dealt to e<span class="f_Format3">ach pile.</span></td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td>24 <a class="popuplink">tableau</a> piles, also known as the "Zodiac" (around all the other piles) - build <a class="popuplink">up or down by suit</a>, Aces and Kings are not consecutive.  Sequences can change up or down within the same pile.  Top card is available for play on the <a class="popuplink">foundations</a><span class="f_Format3"> when the </span><a class="popuplink">stock</a><span class="f_Format3"> and <a class="popuplink">waste</a> are empty.  Cards cannot be moved from one </span><a class="popuplink">tableau</a> pile to another.  Once a card is played to a <a class="popuplink">tableau</a> pile it cannot be played anywhere except to the <a class="popuplink">foundations</a><span class="f_Format3">. </span>At the start of the game 1 card is dealt to e<span class="f_Format3">ach pile.</span></td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td><a class="popuplink">stock</a> (middle left, face down) - Turn over 1 card at a time to the <a class="popuplink">waste</a> by clicking.  Unlimited <a class="popuplink">redeals</a>.</td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<div style="text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height: normal;"><tbody><tr style="vertical-align:baseline" valign="baseline"><td width="13"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Arial'; color: #000000;">•</span></td><td><a class="popuplink">waste</a> (next to <a class="popuplink">stock</a>) - Top card is available for play on the <a class="popuplink">tableau</a><span class="f_Format3"> or </span><a class="popuplink">reserve</a><span class="f_Format3"> piles.</span></td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Notes</span></p>
<p>Because cards cannot be played to the <a class="popuplink">foundations</a><span class="f_Format3"> until the </span><a class="popuplink">stock</a><span class="f_Format3"> and <a class="popuplink">waste</a> are empty, the game divides into two parts.  In the first part, the cards from the </span><a class="popuplink">waste</a> and <a class="popuplink">reserve</a> piles are played to the <a class="popuplink">tableau</a> piles until all the cards are either on the <a class="popuplink">tableau</a> or <a class="popuplink">reserve</a> piles.  If you cannot bring all the cards into play, then the game is lost.  In the second part, the cards are played from the <a class="popuplink">tableau</a> or <a class="popuplink">reserve</a> piles to the <a class="popuplink">foundations</a><span class="f_Format3">.  Only if all the cards can be played up to the </span><a class="popuplink">foundations</a> without blocking can the game be won.</p>

<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">History</span></p>
<p>Zodiac is a very old game, originally appearing in Lady Adelaide Cadogan's patience books in the Nineteenth century.</p>


<p><span style="font-weight: bold;">Similar Games</span></p>

</td></tr></tbody></table>
